Posts.Content: hi, i am sajid and mother is asked for cancer pet test and report show ghe below 3 points.can anyone clear me what it means and what is the stage 1-hypermetabolic left breast mass lesion is likely mitotic 2-hypermetabolic right lung lower lobe lesion and left lung pleural deposit needs exclusion for mitastasis 3- hypermetabolic mediastinal lymphadenopathy needs exclusion for metastasis
Posts.Title: breast cancer pet report understanding
